status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"55one","text":"The human NDP52 cDNA into a pGST2 vector with an N-terminal GST tag followed by\na TEV cleavage site is available from Addgene (RRID: Addgene #187828).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ag2o4","text":"After the transformation of the pGST2 vector encoding GST-TEV-NDP52 in E. coli Rosetta pLySS cells, grow cells in 2xTY medium at   until an OD600 of 0.4 and then continued at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":71,"length":7},{"style":"sub","offset":142,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":129,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":175,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D8D81E401C8E11EE90E303D40EEE91B6","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E60476901C8E11EE90E303D40EEE91B6","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cu0dq","text":"Once the cells reached an OD600 of 0.8, induce protein expression with   IPTG for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":28,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":82,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":87,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"00B818701C8F11EE90E303D40EEE91B6","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":57600,"guid":"07B641B01C8F11EE90E303D40EEE91B6","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0A5508701C8F11EE90E303D40EEE91B6","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4cg6f","text":"Collect cells by centrifugation and resuspend in lysis buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c3gfo","text":"Sonicate cell lysates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4vtlq","text":"Sonicate cell lysates for  . (1/2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"18n8p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"E82F29501C8F11EE90E303D40EEE91B6","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1phjs","text":"Sonicate cell lysates for  . (1/2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"F6D417BF1C8F11EE91900A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f0gc4","text":"Clear lysates by centrifugation at   in a SORVAL RC6+ centrifuge with an F21S8x50Y rotor (Thermo Scientific).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"18000","duration":2700,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0C35E0F01C9011EE90E303D40EEE91B6","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"an99i","text":"Collect the supernatant and incubate with preequilibrated Glutathione Sepharose 4B beads (GE Healthcare) for   at   with gentle shaking to bind GST-NDP52.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":109,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":114,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"2298ED601C9011EE90E303D40EEE91B6","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"262DFB001C9011EE90E303D40EEE91B6","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fb2a0","text":"Centrifuge the samples to pellet the beads and remove the unbound lysate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f8o6j","text":"Wash the beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"27q21","text":"Wash the beads twice with wash buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ehhbe","text":"Wash the beads with high salt wash buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9v308","text":"Again, wash the beads twice with wash buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8f9uo","text":"Incubate beads   with TEV protease at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"efmmk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"6F5040301C9111EE90E303D40EEE91B6","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"78AB1E201C9111EE90E303D40EEE91B6","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bc6bn","text":"After the GST tag was cleaved off, filter the protein through a   syringe filter, concentrated using a 30 kDa cut-off Amicon filter (Merck Millipore), and load onto a pre-equilibrated Superdex 200 Increase 10/300 GL column (Cytiva).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"90258E001C9111EE90E303D40EEE91B6","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":202,"value":"0.45"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e3qm","text":"Elute proteins with SEC buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e1dre","text":"Analyze fractions by SDS-PAGE and Coomassie staining.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7t3q6","text":"Pool fractions containing purified NDP52.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fkas4","text":"After concentrating the purified protein, aliquot the protein and snap-freeze in liquid nitrogen. Store the proteins at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":120,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"031206A01C9211EE90E303D40EEE91B6","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}
